work.name: XAPIENS TEKNOLOGI INDONESIA, part of Indika Energy Group
work.summary: As a data scientist in an IT consultant company, my works vary a lot depending on the clients' need. Some projects that I have worked on are the following
highlights: Predictive Maintenance: Achieved 5% reduction in maintenance costs compared to Condition Based Maintenance (CBM) through successful implementation of predictive maintenance (PdM) using various methods such as Survival Analysis, Bayesian Regression, machine learning, deep learning, and similarity methods, for estimating Remaining Useful Life (RUL) of machinery.
Conformal Prediction: utilized Conformal Prediction to ensure precise prediction intervals across multiple projects, enhancing accuracy and reliability of predictions.

Time Series: Performed time series forecasting initiatives for coal demand estimation of a mining company client, leveraging a range of techniques such as ARIMA, Theta Forecaster, ETS, GARCH, machine learning and deep learning models like Prophet and N-Beats.

Topic Modelling: applied Natural Language Processing (NLP) methodologies including Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA), Non-negative Matrix Factorization (NMF), Latent Semantic Indexing (LSI), and TF-IDF for topic modeling tasks, enhancing understanding and organization of textual data.

Word Co-Occurence Map: Developed word co-occurrence maps using various methods including word-word frequency matrix, word-document frequency matrix, PPMI, word2vec, TF-IDF, custom embedding training, and Fasttext, facilitating comprehensive analysis and visualization of textual relationships.

Interpretable Machine Learning: implemented interpretable machine learning techniques such as SHAP and Lime to enhance model understanding thus providing actionable insights to stakeholders across diverse projects.

Bayesian Optimization: applied Sequential Bayesian Optimization for a paddy rice peeler, optimizing resource utilization and reducing evaluation costs in each iteration, thus enabling efficient proof of concept (PoC) execution.
Video Stitching: developed a video stitching algorithm for proof of concept (PoC) purposes, demonstrating capabilities in computer vision and image processing.
Exploratory Data Analysis: conducted Exploratory Data Analysis for a mining company client, resulting in a 7% increase in annual revenue by uncovering valuable insights from data exploration efforts.
